property.name: zeppelin.download.prebuilt
property.description: If true, will download previously built package instead of building latest code

property.name: zeppelin.install.dir
property.description: Local dir where to install component. incubator-zeppelin folder will be created as a subdir of this dir e.g. /root/incubator-zeppelin

property.name: zeppelin.mvn.dir
property.description: Only needed if download.prebuilt is false as Maven must be installed prior to setting up Zeppelin in this mode. Set this to the location of mvn executable (e.g. /usr/bin/mvn).

property.name: zeppelin.server.port
property.description: Server port.The subsequent port (e.g. 9996) should also be open as it will be used by the web socket

property.name: zeppelin.interpreters
property.description: Comma separated interpreter configurations. First interpreter become a default

property.name: zeppelin.ssl
property.description: Should SSL be used by the servers?

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.client.auth
property.description: Should client authentication be used for SSL connections?

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.keystore.path
property.description: Path to keystore relative to Zeppelin home

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.keystore.type
property.description: The format of the given keystore (e.g. JKS or PKCS12)

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.keystore.password
property.description: Keystore password. Can be obfuscated by the Jetty Password tool

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.key.manager.password
property.description: Key Manager password. Defaults to keystore password. Can be obfuscated.

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.truststore.path
property.description: Path to truststore relative to Zeppelin home. Defaults to the keystore path

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.truststore.type
property.description: The format of the given truststore (e.g. JKS or PKCS12). Defaults to the same type as the keystore type

property.name: zeppelin.ssl.truststore.password
property.description: Truststore password. Can be obfuscated by the Jetty Password tool. Defaults to the keystore password
